headline: W.W. Grainger (GWW): Evaluating Valuation After Earnings Guidance Cut and Third Quarter Profit Pressures
summary: W.W. Grainger reported its third quarter results with sales rising year over year. However, net income fell sharply due to inflation and tariff-related cost pressures. The company also lowered its earnings guidance for 2025, signaling ongoing margin challenges. See our latest analysis for W.W. Grainger. W.W. Grainger’s recent buybacks and steady dividend have not been enough to offset concerns about falling net income and softer guidance. This is reflected in its latest share price of...
